author: andrewgoodwall
title: The future of Cardano is Indian
description: Youth in India are unaware of Cardano and the entrepreneurship opportunities that exist.

f6_assessments.q0: In every age youth are always the foundation of the future, not only for a country but for the whole world. In order to develop the future generation, the proposed group aimed at young Indians. A country with 1.4 billion people and 55% of people under the age of 30 (2016 estimate) has the advantage of infrastructure and consumer equipment. The team proposed with the idea of educating young people about the basics of blockchain through the curriculum on Goodwall. Proposal with a clear description and detailed solution greatly impact the challenge. In addition, the team considered and had solutions for the risks when the project was implemented.
f6_assessments.q1: Proposals provide a clear plan. Detailed roadmap of each work to be done in the project in different time. Reasonable and transparent budget allocation increases the sustainability factor for the project. The team's strength is that its members have an important knowledge base and many years of experience to implement the project. Power up the success of the project
f6_assessments.q2: Proposal offers a detailed step-by-step plan with clear milestones that can be easily tracked on a monthly basis. Reasonable budget is allocated transparently and easily audited. The proposal is brand new and will be a new step forward for the Indian group and youth

f6_assessments.q0: Proposal has provided all the required impact information. The proposer first introduced the problem, then introduced the solution, which is to educate and attract young people to raise awareness about blockchain and Cardano. Proposer has introduced specifically about the characteristics, goals, and objects that the solution is aiming for. Not only that, the proposer also provides more information about his or her organization and the achievements that the organization has achieved. This is a plus because it helps the voters have more confidence in the project. In addition, the proposer has outlined the risks that the project may face as well as solutions, which will help reduce the risks for the project when the founder always has a contingency plan.
f6_assessments.q1: Proposer has provided a fairly complete road map when listing specific tasks to be completed and their deadlines. This is a good point because it shows that the team has arranged things well. The 'detailed budget breakdown' section is well written, however, the proposer can add additional information about each part of the spending plan. For example, for the first activity 'Program Design', the proposer can provide both the cost of the 'Program and challenges design, creation of challenge content' sections, or clarify how the salary will be charged to the person performing the action. Profiles of team members are given very clearly and full of information.
f6_assessments.q2: The information section of Auditability is quite complete. The goals are clearly illustrated by numbers like 2000 videos, 30000 commits, etc. This is a plus point for this proposal because voters can easily see the target when looking at it. Next, setting specific goals and targets as an affirmation for the success of the project, the confidence of the founding team and above all, it shows the transparency and clarity of the project. .

f6_assessments.q0: This project aims to help young people in India know more about Cardano and have more opportunities to start a business here. Project participants will have the opportunity for experiential learning on the Goodwall program, which will guide young people aged 16 to 24 years old who will help learn about Blockchain and its applications, through the world of education and work, giving them access to equal and inclusive with developed communities. More specifically, it is a mobile-first platform with over 2 million members in over 150 countries. In this project, they define very clear goals and specific directions. They will create a playground for Gen Z to maximize their potential as well as create opportunities for them to contribute to society, Goodwall will work closely with them to fine-tune the program.I appreciate this project because of its great impact on young people of the age who can contribute a lot to building a development community. If the project is successful the benefits it will bring such as helping young people across India on how blockchain can be used to drive social impact through creating educational content, videos, organizing seminars, etc. speeches, etc. The main goals proposed by the team are very specific such as getting a minimum of 2,000 video entries that clearly demonstrate Cardano technology solutions from India, 1 million impressions..... Also, there have been clearly identified major risks facing the project, some big risks like fake news, lack of educational awareness, budget issues... all risks are given they have their
f6_assessments.q1: The roadmap section presents the main tasks to implement the Goowall program and divides the times according to the completion time of each task, but in this section, they do not mention the tasks of marketing, network management, project management... However, they are stated in the budget section so I don't know at what stage of the project it will proceed. I think they should detail all the work they will have to do in the project following specific timelines instead of just mentioning the activities to implement the program to make a successful project. Just having a good preparation program is not enough. The project also includes members with extensive experience in program design, project and event management, and execution, digital marketing, social media, Produce and managing the show's design and branding... all have roles in line with the proposed operational tasks, in addition, all members are provided with specific titles and roles in the project.
f6_assessments.q2: They have provided criteria to measure the progress and development of the project with a link to provide detailed project results. The criteria they mentioned also have specific explanations. The successful part that the proposer wants is 2000 video items that clearly show solutions using Cardano technology from India, but I wonder how they will evaluate and evaluate these videos or what standards to determine whether the video is qualified through or not?

f6_assessments.q0:
India is a developing country with great population of youths, since youths always try to get better, and invest in something massive this cardano education will definitely boost them to invest.
As the youth's understand the importance of block chain by the end of 20-24 years, when they attain the job at 25 years , they'll definitely try to investment some part of their  income in cardano projects, hence the proposer has made right decision on selecting age group of people for his model , so  This proposal effectively addresses the challenge
f6_assessments.q1:
Goodwall has previously achieved these task effectively , and even have gained interest in countries like Ghana with massive 4.2+mn people, so provided team can easily complete the task without much difficulty.
The produced model has even very less chances of failure, with such a excellent team provided, Given experience and plan presented it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal has clearly mentioned who are the members working on this project and their experience in this field, the proposal has also provided us ,their previous achievement in this field.
The proposal has very much clearly explained about their timeline and budget break down, the proposed model has  very less chances of failure ,hence the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal meets  certain challenges. Furthermore, the completeness and detail of each question they answer shows how serious and confident they are in the project they will pursue, regardless of the existence of this Goodwall app. First of all, we see that this Goodwall targets young people, especially gen Z, as well as young entrepreneurs about what Blockchain Sailing is and how it works. The first steps they took were amazing such as dialogue behavior with  Goodwall Student Council, Board, Council, regular focus groups and post-program surveys to make the application  more relevant. and increased scalability for even better  infrastructure and user interfaces. . / User. With their long-term view expressed over the next 612 months on how to target the market, all they are doing is a good step forward to expand the blockchain community and take blockchain education seriously. What I admire about this proposal is the information about the micro-missions available to  young people participating in this program, giving us an idea of ​​what they are doing and what they will achieve. Added key objectives to make it more engaging and provided a brief but concise and clear description of the proposition. Then at the end the challenges and risks they may face are explained in great detail and in depth and further, what points they will face and how to solve each challenge. knowledge or risks they can briefly introduce. At the end of the day, the problem statement couldn't be more specific and the solution statement enough to respond well/identify with the problem statement they perfectly solved.
f6_assessments.q1: The project team turned out to be very  prepared to do it, as they provided a small personal description of who they were, compiled by their  social media contacts, creating the possibility of  direct contact and access know them better. In terms of scenarios, they present the stages that need to be completed to achieve their goal, but I think these stages can be explored further. For example, "Design promotional items", what kind of marketing strategy would you use? (If social media, what kind of social media and how do you use it to get more attention?). It is always good to explain each term in detail so that those who are not familiar with it fully understand the proposition. According to the relevant budget, I think the level of detail here is average and still needs more details for each section, such as budget plans, in advertising budgets> must be revealed more (by digital marketing of Facebook advertising for 1k dollars, etc.). Finally, we know that each part of the project will cost, and involves transformation costs, they are very well calculated, decomposes and explained so that we can understand exactly what will happen here. So I think the only thing I recommend will be a little more detailed in the stage.
f6_assessments.q2: I found it interesting that the team was interested in auditability. Not only did they ensure the transmission of information that could help the rest of the community track the progress of the project, but they also established a viability plan in which they would track impressions. Impressions are defined as the number of times branded content is viewed on screen. Engagement Engagement is defined as the number of times branded content was liked/commented on Goodwall. Challenge Entry Challenge entry is defined as a downloaded video or image that is related to the program. And they  also give us an example of their report to show how they report  the results of each KPI. However, there is one strange thing that I discovered, it is about the timeframe of the KPI they will achieve, namely the unavailability, eg every few months. So they have to define for example a KPI of 1 million impressions that should be achieved for each post within a month, or I suggest SMART goals for example, the goal to build the addon is a specific "S" pecific, "M" easurable, "A" chievable, "R"easonable and "T"ime-bound to make this project easier to test. Finally, overall, the roadmap. with less obvious distributions, milestones, and timelines provided in the proposal and should be detailed.

f6_assessments.q0: Goodwall is a well-known mobile-first platform in India, having guided more than 2 million young people aged 16-24 in education and career with 16% in India. Through this platform, the team will create educational content, videos, hold lectures… on blockchain, Cardano to attract young people, raise awareness about blockchain, Cardano. Thanks to that, young people will have awareness about blockchain, its application, solution-oriented to blockchain application... The project also creates Cardano group chats locally, regionally and worldwide, thus Young people can collaborate with each other to realize business ideas. It can be seen that this proposal is consistent with the goal of the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal has a clear roadmap, detailing the work of each stage. Program Preparation takes 8-12 weeks to perform the following tasks: User journey design, Promotional assets design, challenge videos filming and editing, educational series videos filming and editing… The program implementation period is 16 weeks to do the work: Hosting content, analyzing user content, drip - feeding new educational videos, monitoring group chats & responding to questions. After that, there are program results in 3-4 weeks: Engaging with participants with a survey, analysing results, preparing debrief. With a detailed and specific roadmap as above, the proposal can be implemented smoothly.
The total proposed group budget for this project is 22,500 USD, including costs for each work such as program design 2,470 USD, partnership development 1,852 USD, document preparation 2,785 USD, promotion development plan, local and international influencers and digital marketing 2,450 USD, network Manager 4,910 USD, project manager 3,425 USD, reward 1,000 USD. However, the proposed team did not detail the unit cost for each job, such as program and challenge design, how long will it take to create challenge content, how much is the unit price USD/ hour…to serve as a basis for the community to assess whether the cost is reasonable.
In addition, in my opinion, if the team proposes costs for each job in 3 stages as the roadmap states: Program preparation, program implementation, program results, it will be easier to track and manage costs.
The members of the team are all experienced project managers, community experts, product design, marketing ... with links to find out clear and complete information about the team. This is a relatively strong team but I haven't seen that they mention their blockchain knowledge or experience about the Cardano Project. Therefore, in my opinion, the team should invite experts with knowledge of blockchain and Cardano to coordinate the implementation of the project so that the project achieves the set goals.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal gave KPIs, specific numbers to evaluate success such as: 1 million impressions, 30,000 engagements, 2,000 challenge entries, minimum of 2,000 video entries that clearly demonstrate Cardano tech use-case solutions from India… This indicator can be easily checked by the community.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem is that young Indians do not know about Cardano and the opportunity to start a business, the solution is to educate young people with basic knowledge about Cardano through Goodwall. Goodwall has a large customer community with more than 2 million people in 150 countries around the world, of which 16% are Indians. The target audience is young people aged 16-24, the future of society. The solution is clear and detailed, such as: Regular dialogue with Goodwall's student council, regular communication between Goodwall's community management teams and youth on the platform through chats... Besides, the group also raised the risks encountered during the project operation and possible solutions.
f6_assessments.q1:
Roadmap offers sections such as: The preparation of the program in 8-12 weeks with tasks such as designing advertising content, filming and editing videos... The program implementation part with tasks such as content storage, analyze user content, monitor group chats, and answer questionnaires made for 16 weeks. The results section is the amount of interaction with the participants, the analysis of the results, the preparation of the interview of about 3-4 weeks duration. Thus, the proposal clearly knows what it needs to do and allocates time for each item reasonably.
The budget has given the contents and the corresponding amount, but there is still no specific unit price to be able to accurately evaluate, but I find that the project divided into such specific jobs is reasonable. 
Team members are clear, have linkedin to check. Team members have expertise related to the proposed project such as experience in project implementation management, event management, community management, so with this project they can do it successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The project plans to get 2,000 videos in different languages posted to Goodwall. If the team recommends providing more videos in what languages it will be more specific and make the project more successful. The project should clearly define 30,000 engagements to make it easier to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal would have an impact to the Cardano ecosystem and is aligned with the challenge goal as it would help: Educate youth on the basics of blockchain, its applications, and social impact possibilities, while using a great platform already existent which is the Goodwall on which a a lot of youth all connected. Almost 4 million aged from 16 - 24 years old.
f6_assessments.q1:
The Proposers team comprises members who have different background, which is great, but they're just starting to familiarize with the project Catalyst.
GoodWall is a great platform from which a lot of youth may be contacted, and using that to promote and talk about Cardano will surely help spread the word among youth in particular and the Indian population in general as they're connected to their families, friends and other relatives.
The budget of this proposal is detailed but not much explained on some budget lines that it doesn't allow to real assess ho much would be the cost suggested. This proposal cost around 15% of the total budget that may be much compare to various others proposals submitted in this challenge. To tackle this situation I would see the importance for the Proposers to collaborate with another group of proposers in the challenge Grow East Asia, grow Cardano who have submitted a proposal very similar to this.
It would preferably be important to offer the prizes to participants in ADA, so winners may have their new wallets and start using ADA if still new to it.
What I also find interesting, is the idea to incentivized youth who produce content around Cardano and share it with the community, and also they was they will be encouraged to come up with ideas to submit as proposals to the project catalyst. this makes the project interactive between  proposers, participants and the Catalyst community
f6_assessments.q2:
GoodWall will be exploited by the Proposers to publish at he project progress. This would allow the community to follow.
Also the  videos and other contents produced will be placed there.

solution: Educate youth on the basics of blockchain, its applications, and social impact possibilities, via experiential learning programs on Goodwall
experience: Goodwall is a mobile-first platform with 2M+ members across 150+ countries, guiding youth aged 16-24 through the world of education and work. Goodwall has hosted a number of wide-scale programs and challenges on the platform, with a recent program reaching 4.2M+ youth in Ghana.
